    • parseParameters

      public void parseParameters​(String[] args) throws IOException
      Read command line arguments passed from main and create Files types from arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments passed from main File objects added to sourceFiles list and pFile set from command line arguments
      Throws:
      IOException

    • findSourceFiles

      public void findSourceFiles​(String argument)
      Called by parseParameters, take command line argument and searches for source files to add to list of source files.
      Parameters:
      argument - file path String recursively retrieves all source files within given directory and adds them to sourceFiles

    • searchDirectories

      public Vector<File> searchDirectories​(File argument)
      Recursively searches directory structure to find all files
      Parameters:
      argument - File/directory to search
      Returns:
      foundFiles array of found Files within directory and sub-directories
